participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative, nurturing, and reflective with a passion for the arts.
participant_1.background: I read a poem or two to get my creative juices flowing before starting my day. I am a stay at home mom because my depression and anxiety makes it difficult for me to work outside the home. I ride my scooter down the boardwalk until the wind blows away my worries. I tried my hand at gambling, but I didn't have the stomach for it. I paint my nails in different colors to match my outfits.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Adventurous, nostalgic, and enthusiastic about family and culture.
participant_2.background: I have a large family due to my viking heritage. My Nintendo 64 is probably my most valued possession because it was my first console and it has a lot of sentimental value to me. I'm not sure of my current weight, but I'm working on it. I do not know why my sister in law dislikes me. I like to travel and document my experiences on my blog.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do?
I like to travel and document my experiences on my blog.
That sounds fun! Do you have any favorite places you've been?
I've been to a lot of places, but my favorite is probably Japan.
Japan sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go there.
It's a beautiful country with a rich culture.
I bet it is. I've heard great things about the food there.
The food is amazing! I could eat sushi every day.
I love sushi! I'm actually having some for lunch today.
I'm glad you like sushi. I'm going to have to go to Japan sometime soon.
You definitely should! It's a great place to visit.
I will. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm glad I could help.
